Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
06.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
01.02.2013 SH SCR17925 Button Change Debtors: Added test to avoid starting BCA301C if still runing
02.02.2012 JH SCR17062 Changed calls of GB500_OLD to the new GB500
19.10.2009 SH SCR14941 Added update CLNT398_LASTUPDATE
06.08.2009 SH SCR14794 Added button Change debtors (calls BCA301C)
01.12.2006 SH SCR12126 Fixed probem with test on
debtor client numbers from/until
06.09.2006 SH SCR11799 Changed transaction handling
15.03.2006 CO SCR10621 Made "User"field modifiable in Entry Screen
13.12.2005 SH SCR9551 Disabled F5 list for CLDD_USER if an existing row has to
be modified (P-Key fields have not to be changed)
06.10.2005 SH SCR9123 Added test that only 1 -10 is allowed for CLDD_DAYNO
Pushbutton handling
Pushbutton handling
... online
... entry screen
... delete
-- Disable button in toolbar
-- Disabled buttons in toolbar in case of empty view
-- Check if BCA301C is still running
.... modify / query
... new
... delete
-- Message: "Program is still running, please try later"
-- Disable buttons in toolbar
-- Users press key 'Esc', see R.M. where UserAction 19 is performed
... Users changes something on screen, ask for confirmation
... only day numbes 1 until 10 are allowed
... invaild CLDD_USER
... CLDD row already exists (=duplicte key)
... at least CLDD_DEBH_FROM or CLDD_DEBC_FROM has to be entered
... if CLDD_DEBC_FROM is entered then CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL is mandatory and has to be
greater than CLDD_DEBC_FROM
... debtor client has to be filled with leading 0 because of alpha fields, where
test on 12345 until 100000 has to be valid, also working if alpha characters
exists
... if CLDD_DEBH_FROM is entered then CLDD_DEBH_UNTIL is mandatory and has to be
greater than CLDD_DEBH_FROM
... in case of no errors store entries to DB
